description: Example configurations for Binance market toggle (ADR-004)

futures_only.description: Recommended for Futures Testnet - disables Spot to eliminate -2015 errors

spot_only.description: For Spot trading only - disables Futures

both_enabled_explicit.description: Explicitly enable both markets (same as default)

default_backward_compatible.description: Default configuration - both markets enabled implicitly
default_backward_compatible.note: When enable_spot and enable_futures are omitted, both default to true

usage.sqlite_update: UPDATE account_config SET config = json_set(config, '$.enable_spot', json('false')) WHERE user_id = 'gz_user1';
usage.python_script: See doc/TESTNET.md section 'Disabling Spot Login' for complete examples
